stk.utilities.mplogging module¶

Defines tools to make logging comptaible with multiprocessing.

Based largely on: https://gist.github.com/schlamar/7003737

class stk.utilities.mplogging.MPLogger(name, level=0)¶

Bases: logging.Logger

handle(record)¶
isEnabledFor(level)¶

Is this logger enabled for level ‘level’?

log_queue = None¶
stk.utilities.mplogging.daemon_logger(log_queue)¶

Logs messages from subprocesses in the main process.

Parameters:log_queue (multiprocessing.Queue) – A queue into which log records are sent by subprocesses.
Returns:None
Return type:NoneType
stk.utilities.mplogging.logged_call(log_queue, func, *args, **kwargs)¶
